name: Boys & Girls Games Collection
description:
Walk in one of the fantastic arcade rooms and check out all the astonishing game machines.
You will find all sorts of games, ranging from funny match-3 games, amazing space racing, old fashion arcade games and much more.
There is something for all taste

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ Fun Games - Funny Games
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ First person view to move
✔ Amazing games: Sliding puzzles, fruit match, Joe bounce, forest defender, etc.
✔ An extremely entertaining game collection!

How to play: To open a game, simply walk in front of the arcade machine and tap on her. You game will be displayed immediately.


Enter the most entertaining game room ever.
